cbinstall.description: Provides UddeIM private message system integration for Community Builder.

param.name: pmsDelete
param.label: Auto Delete
param.description: Enable or disable automatic deletion of private message information for a user when a user is deleted.

param.name: pmsDeleteSent
param.label: Delete Sent
param.description: Enable or disable automatic deletion of messages sent by a user when a user is deleted.

param.name: pmsDeleteRecieved
param.label: Delete Recieved
param.description: Enable or disable automatic deletion of messages sent to a user when a user is deleted.

param.name: pmsShowTitle
param.label: Show Title
param.description: Enable or disable display of tab title in quick message panel.

param.name: pmsShowSubject
param.label: Show Subject
param.description: Enable or disable display of quick message subject input. Subject will automatically prepend to the message.
